backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with types, authorization mixin, storage maps, and query methods for profiles and other domain data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for admin dashboard work, including involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides one‑line descriptions of many frontend files for build and feature mapping.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a custom OKLCH color system for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting language to Portuguese and loading the main React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, and generated icon assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration wiring all application routes including /admin.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: Access‑control wrapper component that restricts sections to authenticated admins.
frontend/src/components/appeal/AppealEdi: Editor de texto para recursos gerados, permitindo edição, download do arquivo e envio por e‑mail.
frontend/src/components/appeal/AppealWiz: Assistente em etapas para gerar recursos, coletando plataforma, motivo, descrição e evidências, e depois exibindo o editor.
frontend/src/components/appeal/EvidenceP: Lista de evidências cadastradas permitindo seleção múltipla com badges, datas formatadas e estado de carregamento.
frontend/src/components/appeal/SendViaEm: Botão que abre cliente de e‑mail com texto do recurso e alerta sobre anexos manuais necessários.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout principal com navegação, menu lateral responsivo e itens condicionais para usuários autenticados e administradores.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Componente que bloqueia acesso a conteúdo até que o usuário esteja autenticado, exibindo alerta e botão de login.
frontend/src/components/collective/Colle: Renders filters for platform, reason, region, and period, updating parent state on selection.
Dialog prompting users to anonymously share a report with region and neighborhood selection and optional 'don't ask again' setting.
frontend/src/components/collective/Platf: Displays a filtered bar chart showing report counts per platform using collective report data.
frontend/src/components/collective/Reaso: Shows a vertical bar chart of report counts by reason, filtered by various criteria.
frontend/src/components/collective/Trend: Plots a time‑based line chart of daily report counts over a selected period with applied filters.
frontend/src/components/evidence/Evidenc: Provides dropdown filters for evidence type and platform, updating the parent with selected values.
Toolbar for selecting all/none evidence items and exporting selected ones as a ZIP.
Displays a filterable evidence timeline with selectable cards and image previews, loading data via useGetTimeline.
Provides a form to upload new evidence, submit metadata, and store images in IndexedDB.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Botão de login/logout integrado ao Internet Identity, lidando com estados de autenticação e limpeza de cache.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossProfile: Lets users edit financial loss profile data and save it via useSetLossProfile.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossProject: Renders a bar chart showing 30/60/90‑day loss projections based on calculated values.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossReportA: Offers actions to download or share a text-based loss report generated from profile data.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossResults: Displays weekly, monthly, accumulated, and 90‑day projected loss metrics in summary cards.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal exibido para novos usuários preencherem nome e e-mail antes de continuar, salvando o perfil via API.
frontend/src/components/sessions/WorkSes: Controls starting and ending work sessions and periodically logs weather data while active.
Displays a list of work sessions with loading, empty, and active session states, allowing navigation to session details.
Combines controls for starting work sessions with a list of previous sessions, tracking the active session ID.
frontend/src/components/subscription/Fea: Guards access to features based on subscription entitlement, showing locked UI with upgrade prompts when restricted.
frontend/src/components/trust/TrustBadge: Renders a set of trust and security badges for display on marketing or checkout pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks for fetching all user access info and blocking or unblocking users via admin actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppeals.ts: Implements hooks for generating appeals and fetching individual or user-specific appeals from the backend.
Contains hooks for submitting and retrieving collective reports using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Exposes current user authentication state, principal identifiers, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvidence.ts: Supplies hooks for creating evidence, fetching evidence by ID or all evidence, and retrieving a filtered timeline.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Fetches and exposes whether the current caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useLossProfile.ts: Provides hooks to get and update the caller’s loss profile from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches a predefined Reviso Motivada message from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: Manages subscription status, entitlement evaluation, and subscription upgrades through backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile using react-query and actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorkSessions.ts: Hooks for logging, ending, updating weather, and fetching work sessions with react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/collectiveOptions.ts: Maps regions to predefined neighborhood lists and exposes a lookup function.
frontend/src/lib/evidenceIndexedDb.ts: IndexedDB helpers to store and retrieve evidence images plus a hook to expose them as object URLs.
frontend/src/lib/lossCalculations.ts: Calculates weekly, monthly, accumulated, and projected financial losses from a loss profile.
frontend/src/lib/mailto.ts: Builds mailto links for appeals using platform-specific emails and subjects.
Stores, retrieves, and clears the selected subscription plan in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/pdfReport.ts: Generates a text-based PDF-like loss report as a downloadable blob.
frontend/src/lib/subscriptions/plans.ts: Defines subscription plans and provides a lookup by plan ID.
frontend/src/lib/subscriptions/rules.ts: Evaluates user entitlement and formats subscription expiry dates.
frontend/src/lib/weatherClient.ts: Fetches weather data for a city and maps API results to internal conditions.
frontend/src/lib/zipExport.ts: Exports evidence metadata and images by generating downloads for each item.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with react-query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page showing user access info with search, blocking, and unblocking actions.
frontend/src/pages/AppealGeneratorPage.t: Form for generating appeals using platform, reason, explanation, and selected evidence, calling an API and handling subscription errors.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout flow that retrieves a selected plan and processes payments via various methods, upgrading the user's subscription.
frontend/src/pages/CollectiveInsightsPag: Displays collective deactivation analytics with filters and charts for platforms, reasons, regions, and trends.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard offering quick access shortcuts and navigation cards to core modules like evidences, calculator, appeals, and collective data.
frontend/src/pages/DataPolicyPage.tsx: Static page presenting the app’s data policy, detailing principles, legal bases, data categories, and purposes.
frontend/src/pages/EvidenceDetailPage.ts: Shows detailed information about a single evidence item, including image, metadata, platform, and notes.
frontend/src/pages/EvidenceTrackerPage.t: Renders the evidence tracker with tabs for uploading evidence and managing work sessions, wrapped in an AuthGate.
frontend/src/pages/LossCalculatorPage.ts: Displays a loss calculation workflow with a profile form, results, projection chart, and report actions behind authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Shows available payment methods, links to plan selection, and includes trust badges and payment info.
frontend/src/pages/PlansBillingPage.tsx: Lists subscription plans, highlights popular options, handles plan selection, and shows current entitlement details.
frontend/src/pages/PlansDashboardPage.ts: Provides a subscription dashboard showing current plan status and a comparison of all available plans with upgrade options.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the app’s privacy policy inside a scrollable card with structured sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to view and update personal profile data and shows their Internet Identity information.
frontend/src/pages/PublicOverviewPage.ts: Landing page presenting core features and navigation actions for plans and privacy details.
frontend/src/pages/QuickProcessLookupPag: Provides a form to search process numbers and displays placeholder alerts for upcoming tracking features.
frontend/src/pages/WorkSessionDetailPage: Fetches and displays detailed information for a work session including times, city, weather, and duration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theming, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project state file outlining app summary, architecture notes, features, and version metadata.
